data.text: @NotTheRealOcho @SalomonJA In the US we only do sporadic variant testing at best but at least in the SF Bay we perform wastewater surveillance which has the advantage of sampling the overall population rather than an individual who has to test and report. https://t.co/eeJMzFfZzr
